SELECT boardno, tag, store_name storeName, loc, content, writer, hit, score, writtendate, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tastycomment_kg WHERE boardno = tastyboard_kg.boardno ) AS commentCnt, ( SELECT min(fileno) FROM tastyfile_kg WHERE boardno = tastyboard_kg.boardno ) AS fileno FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM tastyboard_kg
WHERE loc LIKE '%' || '${keyword }' || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || '${keyword }' || '%' OR writer LIKE '%' || '${keyword }' || '%'
WHERE ${searchType } LIKE '%' || '${keyword }' || '%'
ORDER BY boardno DESC ) B ORDER BY rnum ) tastyboard_kg WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }
